properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 2:53AM EST until January 5 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet. For the Small Craft
Advisory, seas 5 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 7 AM EST this morning. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 1 PM EST
this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
